column1: Ciro Redondo is a municipality and town in the Ciego de Ávila Province of Cuba. It is located halfway between the cities of Ciego de Ávila and  Morón and was named after the Cuban revolutionary.

column2: the municipality of Ciro Redondo had a population of 29
column3: 560. With a total area of 588 km2 (227 sq mi)
column4: it has a population density of 50.3/km2 (130/sq mi).
